message.body: Katya!! You still planing to come to boston this weekend??
Yes mam!!! Friday night Julia's opening @ BU! Did I send you the invite??

No you never sent me the invite. Send it!! I have a dinner with Wendy and the guy who runs her gallery Friday. She just planned it. So I kinda have to coordinate around it. But I really want to see you!!! It would be so nice!!!
No problem! The opening is from 530-730 and I'll be there from the beginning! It's on BU campus I'll send it to you and Nadine the invite!!! Really hope we can coordinate!
